list.title: ActionRow#addComponent
list.description: Add a component to the action row

list.title: ActionRow#addComponents
list.description: Add multiple components to the action row

list.title: ActionRow#setComponents
list.description: Set the components of the action row

list.title: Application#cacheChannels
list.description: boolean to enable or disable the client channels cache

list.title: Application#cacheGuilds
list.description: boolean to enable or disable the client guilds cache

list.title: Application#cacheMembers
list.description: boolean to enable or disable the client members cache

list.title: Application#cacheRoles
list.description: boolean to enable or disable the client roles cache

list.title: Application#cacheUsers
list.description: boolean to enable or disable the client users cache

list.title: Application#customCacheCooldown
list.description: set a custom cool down in milliseconds to save the cache in the mongoose database

list.title: Application#readySince
list.description: The unix timestamp since when the bot is ready

list.title: Application#setAppCommands
list.description: Set the Slash Commands for the Application

list.title: Application#setGuildCommands
list.description: Set the Slash Commands for a Guild

list.title: Application#useMongooseCache
list.description: boolean to enable or disable that interactions.js use the mongoose connection to save and load cache

list.title: Button#setDisabled
list.description: set the button as disabled or not

list.title: Channel#applicationId
list.description: The application id of the group DM creator if it is bot-created

list.title: Channel#bitrate
list.description: the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel

list.title: Channel#defaultAutoArchiveDuration
list.description: default duration that the clients (not the API) will use for newly created threads, in minutes, to automatically archive the thread after recent activity, can be set to: 60, 1440, 4320, 10080

list.title: Channel#guildId
list.description: the id of the guild (may be missing for some channel objects received over gateway guild dispatches)

list.title: Channel#lastMessageId
list.description: the id of the last message sent in this channel (or thread for GUILD_FORUM channels) (may not point to an existing or valid message or thread)

list.title: Channel#lastPinTimestamp
list.description: when the last pinned message was pinned.

list.title: Channel#member
list.description: thread member object for the current user, if they have joined the thread, only included on certain API endpoints

list.title: Channel#memberCount
list.description: an approximate count of users in a thread, stops counting at 50

list.title: Channel#messageCount
list.description: number of messages (not including the initial message or deleted messages) in a thread (if the thread was created before July 1, 2022, it stops counting at 50)

list.title: Channel#ownerId
list.description: id of the creator of the group DM or thread

list.title: Channel#parentId
list.description: for guild channels: id of the parent category for a channel (each parent category can contain up to 50 channels), for threads: id of the text channel this thread was created

list.title: Channel#permissionOverwrites
list.description: explicit permission overwrites for members and roles

list.title: Channel#permissions
list.description: computed permissions for the invoking user in the channel, including overwrites, only included when part of the resolved data received on a slash command interaction

list.title: Channel#ratelimitPerUser
list.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600); bots, as well as users with the permission manage_messages or manage_channel, are unaffected

list.title: Channel#RTCRegion
list.description: voice region id for the voice channel, automatic when set to null

list.title: Channel#threadMetaData
list.description: thread-specific fields not needed by other channels

list.title: Channel#totalMessageSent
list.description: number of messages ever sent in a thread, it's similar to message_count on message creation, but will not decrement the number when a message is deleted

list.title: Channel#userLimit
list.description: the user limit of the voice channel

list.title: Channel#videoQualityMode
list.description: the camera video quality mode of the voice channel, 1 when not present

list.title: ChannelManager#getChannel
list.description: Get the channel from cache if enabled

list.title: Embed#addField
list.description:
Add a field to the embed

You can have a maximum of 25 fields.

list.title: Embed#addFields
list.description: Appends fields to the embed You can have a maximum of 25 fields.

list.title: Embed#setFields
list.description: Sets the embed's fields You can set a maximum of 25 fields.

list.title: Guild#botPermissions
list.description: Bitwise set of permissions the app or bot has within the channel the interaction was sent from

list.title: Interaction#applicationId
list.description: ID of the application this interaction is for

list.title: Interaction#appPermissions
list.description: bitwise set of permissions the app or bot has within the channel the interaction was sent from

list.title: Interaction#channelId
list.description: channel that the interaction was sent from

list.title: Interaction#client
list.description: the client that is bound to the interaction

list.title: Interaction#components
list.description: Return the components data of the interaction (for modals)

list.title: Interaction#deferReply
list.description: ACK an interaction and edit a response later, the user sees a loading state

list.title: Interaction#deferUpdate
list.description: For components, ACK an interaction and edit the original message later; the user does not see a loading state

list.title: Interaction#isAutoComplete
list.description: Check if the interaction is an auto complete

list.title: Interaction#isCommand
list.description: Check if the interaction is an application command

list.title: Interaction#isComponent
list.description: Check if the interaction is a message component

list.title: Interaction#isInGuild
list.description: Check if the interaction is in a guild

list.title: Interaction#isModal
list.description: Check if the interaction is a modal submit

list.title: Interaction#showModal
list.description: Response to an interaction with a modal

list.title: Interaction#token
list.description: continuation token for responding to the interaction

list.title: Interaction#values
list.description: select menu values if select menu interaction

list.title: Member#communicationDisabledUntil
list.description: when the user's timeout will expire and the user will be able to communicate in the guild again, null or a time in the past if the user is not timed out

list.title: Member#deaf
list.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels

list.title: Member#isPending
list.description: whether the user has not yet passed the guild's Membership Screening requirements

list.title: Member#muted
list.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels

list.title: Member#pending
list.description: whether the user has not yet passed the guild's Membership Screening requirements

list.title: Member#permissions
list.description: total permissions of the member in the channel, including overwrites, returned when in the interaction object

list.title: Member#premiumSince
list.description: when the user started boosting the guild

list.title: Message#attachments
list.description: an array of attachments in the message

list.title: Message#author
list.description: a user object of the message author

list.title: Message#channelId
list.description: the channel id the message was sent in

list.title: Message#components
list.description: an array of components in the message

list.title: Message#editTimestamp
list.description: a timestamp when the message got edited if the message got edited

list.title: Message#embeds
list.description: an array of embeds in the message

list.title: Message#mentionEveryone
list.description: if the message mention everyone or not

list.title: Message#mentions
list.description: an array of mentions in the message

list.title: Message#pinned
list.description: if the message is pinned or not

list.title: Message#timestamp
list.description: the timestamp the message was sent at

list.title: Message#tts
list.description: if the message is a tts message or not

list.title: Modal#addComponents
list.description: Add an array of components to the modal

list.title: Modal#setCustomId
list.description: set the custom id for the modal

list.title: SelectMenu#addOption
list.description: add a single option to the select menu

list.title: SelectMenu#setChannelTypes
list.description: set the channel types that select menu is available in (only available for channel select menu)

list.title: SelectMenu#setCustomId
list.description: Set the custom id of the select menu

list.title: SelectMenu#setDisabled
list.description: set the disabled state of the select menu

list.title: SelectMenu#setMaxValues
list.description: set the maximum number of options that can be selected

list.title: SelectMenu#setMinValues
list.description: set the minimum number of options that must be selected

list.title: SelectMenu#setOptions
list.description: set the options of the select menu

list.title: SelectMenu#setPlaceholder
list.description: set the placeholder of the select menu

list.title: SelectMenu#setType
list.description: Set the type of the select menu

list.title: SelectMenuOption#setDefault
list.description: set the default state of the option

list.title: SelectMenuOption#setDescription
list.description: Set the description of the select menu option

list.title: SelectMenuOption#setEmoji
list.description: Set the emoji of the select menu option

list.title: SelectMenuOption#setLabel
list.description: Set the label of the select menu option

list.title: SelectMenuOption#setValue
list.description: Set the value of the select menu option

list.title: TextInput#setCustomId
list.description: set the custom id for the text input

list.title: TextInput#setMaxLength
list.description: set the max length of the text input

list.title: TextInput#setMinLength
list.description: set the min length of the text input

list.title: TextInput#setPlaceholder
list.description: set the placeholder of the text input

list.title: TextInput#setStyle
list.description: set the style of the text input

list.title: TextInput#setValue
list.description: set the value of the text input

list.title: Utils#checkURL
list.description: Check if the input is an url
